articles.description: Australian selectors are mulling over their line-up for the third and final Test against South Africa, while hoping to have injured duo Mitchell Starc and Cameron Green available for the upcoming tour of India.
articles.content:
Mitchell Starc has targeted Australia's tour of India for his Test return after sustaining a serious finger injury against South Africa.
